alert.note: Alert for Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Frank Church Wilderness; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 12 at 4:23AM MST until January 13 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, light snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 40 below zero. * WHERE...Frank Church Wilderness, Sawtooth/Stanley Basin, Sun Valley Region, and Big Lost Highlands, including but not limited to Clayton, Stanley, Ketchum, Sun Valley, Galena, and Copper Basin. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 5 PM MST this afternoon. For the Wind Chill Warning, from 8 PM this evening to 9 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Areas of blowing and drifting snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by visiting 511.idaho.gov.
